content:
Hello, I'm trying to learn lean, but I'm running into [Errno 13] Permission denied: 'leanpkg' when trying to create a new leanproject. What is going wrong here?
leanproject seems to be installed, but running any leanproject command results in this error

solution
i think somehow leanproject got onto my path but not the other bins, i just had to add .elan/bin/ to path
